title: 1. Welcome & Server Rates
description:
**Server Specs:** No Wipes, Corsair Client (Oct 2021).

**Premium Benefits:**
- Max LT +5000
- Knowledge Chance +100% (Higher Knowledge +10%)
- Energy Recovery +5
- Combat/Skill/Life EXP +200%
- Mount EXP +30%
- Amity +100%
- Luck +5
- **Monster AP +60** (Crucial for endgame)

**Server Features:**
- **High Rates:** Silver, EXP, Skill EXP, Lifeskill mats produced at high rates.
- **QoL:** Akhrad/Olucas drop as crystals. Corrupted Crystals drop instead of Clear Blackstar. Yellow Crystals drop as Magical Shards.
- **Agris:** Auto-unlocked, consumes 1 point per mob. Book auto-completes at Lvl 56.
- **Instant:** Leveling quests (60-65), 200CP, 200 Energy, Map Knowledge.

title: 2. Main Guide: 5-Minute Leveling
description:
**Step-by-Step Guide:**
1. Create Character -> Talk to Black Spirit -> Complete 'The Start of an Adventure'.
2. **WARNING:** Do **NOT** take the 'Exodus Instant level 49' quest yet!
3. Use 530%/600% Scrolls and grind manually to **Level 50**.
4. Talk to Black Spirit -> Complete '[To Level 50!] Go Beyond Your Limits'.
5. Grind manually to **Level 61-63**.
6. **NOW** take 'Exodus Instant level 49' from Black Spirit -> You will jump to **Level 71-73**.
7. Go to **Jamie Drucker** (Velia), buy 'Book of Training', and use dummies to hit 99%.

title: 3. Beginner PVE & Potions
description:
**Instant Quests (Black Spirit):**
- 200 Contribution, 200 Energy, Starter Gear, Log Books, Agris.

**Challenge Rewards [Y]:**
- T8 Horse, T4 Fairy, 30k Pearls, Free T4 Pets (Weight).

**Infinite Potions:**
- Collect **Exodus Tokens** -> Exchange at **Igor Bartali** (Velia) for Full HP/MP Potions.
- **Upgrade:** Heat Ornette's/Odore's with **Primordial Dawn** (Drop: Thornwood/Shultz) -> Hestia's Spirit Essence.

**Starter Grinds:**
- **Polly's Forest:** SP/EXP.
- **Tshira Ruins:** Caphras.
- **Marie Cave:** Memory Fragments.
- **Mediah (Helms/Rogues/Manes):** Accessory Cups & Snowflakes.

title: 4. Flame & Ember Locations
description:
**Flame of the Primordial (Weapons):**
- Gyfin Rhasia, Mirumok Ruins, Saunils, Desert Nagas, Thornwood Forest, Shultz Guard.
- *Rate: 0.5%*

**Daemon Flame (Armor):**
- Abandoned Monastery, Basilisk, Aakman, Fadus.
- *Rate: 0.5%*

**Exalted Flame (Exalted Gear):**
- All Exalted Spots.
- *Rate: 0.05%*

**Other Flames (5% Rate):**
- **Flame of Frost:** Helms Post
- **Flame of Despair:** Wandering Rogues
- **Flame of Hongik:** Abandoned Iron Mine
- **Flame of Resonance:** Manes Hideout

title: 5. End-Game PVE Spots (Part 1)
description:
**Gyfin Rhasia (450 AP, 610 DP, Party 5):**
- Drops: Primordial BS, Eternal Ring, Exalted Flame/Ember, Eternal Tome (Evasion).
- High Mass of Pure Magic & Caphras.

**Mirumok Ruins (340 AP, 500 DP, Party 3):**
- Drops: Glorious Crystal (Olucus/Ahkrad), Primordial BS, Ring of Perseus, Primordial Flame/Ember, Primordial Tome (DR).

**Thornwood Forest (320 AP, 450 DP, Solo):**
- Drops: Primordial BS/Mem Frags, Primordial Earring/Flame, Athena's Judgement (HP/Monster DR), Primordial Dawn.

**Shultz Guard (330 AP, 900 Acc, 450 DP, Party 2):**
- Drops: Primordial Tome (Base), Primordial BS/Mem Frags, Primordial Earring/Flame, Primordial Dawn.

title: 6. End-Game PVE Spots (Part 2)
description:
**Saunils / Desert Nagas (320-340 AP, 450 DP, Solo):**
- Drops: Primordial Ring, Primordial Flame/Ember, Primordial Elkarr, Medusa's Corrupted Crystal (Crit/Back Dmg).

**Fadus (330 AP, 900 Acc, 450 DP, Solo):**
- Drops: Primordial Belt, Daemon Flame/Ember, Primordial Dusk, Artemis Harmony (100% PvE Resist, 50 Monster AP).

**Abandoned Monastery (340 AP, 500 DP, Party 2):**
- Drops: Primordial Belt, Daemon Flame/Ember, Primordial Dusk, Persephone's Revenge (25 DR, 250 HP). High Silver.

**Aakman / Basilisk (340 AP, 500 DP, Solo/Party 2):**
- Drops: Primordial Necklace, Daemon Flame/Ember, Primordial Dusk.

title: 7. End-Game PVE Spots (Part 3)
description:
**Protty Cave (320 AP, 450 DP, Solo):**
- Drops: Medusa's Macalod, Primordial BS, Mem Frags, Visionary Elkarr (20 Acc, 10% Ignore Resist).

**Sycraia (320 AP, 450 DP, Solo):**
- Drops: Medusa's Hoom, Primordial BS, Mem Frags, Hermes Special Evasion (10% Special Eva, 150 HP).

**Cadry's Ruins:** Exalted Earring, Aether's Journey (Shoes: Monster AP+20, HP+250).
**Kratuga Ruins:** Exalted Ring, Aphrodite's Love (Gloves: Acc+20, Monster AP+50, Down Atk+10%), Exalted Water Stone.
**Hexe Sanctuary:** Eye of the Golem, Hexe Shoulder (100 Monster AP), Origin of Dark Hunger.

**Ibedor Scroll:** Mass of Pure Magic, Exalted/Primordial BS, Eternia Crystal, Valks (+10k/15k).

title: 8. Terraria Crossover (Spots & Titles)
description:
**Terraria Spots (Drop Etherian Mana, Demon Hearts, Mass of Pure Magic):**
- **Altar Imps:** High Mana/Silver.
- **Bloody Monastery:** Very High Mana/Caphras.
- **Orcs:** High Primordial Stones.
- **Biraghi Den:** Very High Silver.

**Unique Titles:**
- **Meowmere (Pink Aura):** Exchange.
- **Moon Lord (Blue Aura):** Kill 150 Kagtum Chasers.
- **The Destroyer (Red Smoke):** Kill 80 Frenzied Executioners.
- **Plantera (Yellow Aura):** Kill 35 Indomitable Golems.
- **Necromancer (Purple Fog):** Kill 156 Gairas.
- **Terra Blade (Green Lightning):** Kill 50 Forest Ronaros Scouts.
- **Hardmode Herald:** Kill 50 Indomitable Golems.
- **99% Fishing, 1% Fighting:** Fish 8 Plump Pufferfish.
- **No Death, No Problem:** Kill 40 Gairas.

title: 9. Sea Monster Drops (Stalker/Hekaru/Candidum)
description:
**Ocean Stalker:**
- Skin (4-8), Pure Pearl Crystal (20-100), Bright Reef (50-100), Caphras (50-100), Verdant BS (100-200), Crow Coins (5-15).

**Hekaru:**
- Spike (100-200), Amethyst Spike (1-2), Pure Pearl (20-40), Caphras (10-20), Verdant BS (50-100).

**Candidum:**
- **Rich Merchant Ring Piece (Ultra Rare)**, Shimmering Old Moon Piece, Shell (10-20), Brilliant Salt (20-40), Brilliant Pearl (20-40).

**Nineshark / Black Rust:**
- Similar to Candidum (Ring Piece, Horn/Jawbone, Tongue/Fin).

title: 10. Sea Monster Drops (Crocs/Lekrashan/Goldmont)
description:
**Saltwater Crocodiles:**
- Rich Merchant Piece, Shimmering Old Moon Piece, Spirit Pouch (30-50), Margoria Token (1-11), Crow Coins (10-100), Deep Tide Timber.

**Lekrashan:**
- **Melusine's Scale (6-12)**, Tear of the Ocean (50-100), Sunset BS (50), Solar/Fiery/Frosted/Lunar BS, Crow Coins (150-200).

**Goldmont Battleships:**
- **Neralda's Frozen Tear (3-12)**, Claws of the Waves, Moon Vein Flax (20-200), Deep Tide Timber (20-60), Brilliant Salt/Pearl, Golden Coin (2000-3500).

title: 11. Barter & Mythical Carrack
description:
**Barter:** Refresh Cost 1 Point. Max 12 Exchanges per item. Crow Coins buffed.

**Mythical Carrack - Poseidon:**
- **Stats:** 150% Speed/Accel/Turn/Brake, 50k LT, 4s Reload, 150 Cabins, 10.5M Durability, 10M Rations.
- **Requirements:**
  - +10 Chiro's Cannon, Sail, Figurehead, Plating
  - 5,000x Crystallized Gold Flax (Heat Moon Vein Flax + Topaz)
  - 5,000x Topaz Coated Timber (Grind Deep Tide Timber + Gold Topaz)
  - 5,000x Shimmering Ocean Ingot (Shake Brilliant Salt + Shining Powder)
  - 100x Neralda's Frozen Tear
  - 100x Melusine's Scale
  - 100,000x Caphras Stones

title: 12. World Bosses (Timers & Loot)
description:
**Timers (GMT):**
- **Kzarka:** 04:00, 11:00, 21:15
- **Karanda:** 06:15, 23:15
- **Garmoth:** Tue/Thu 04:15, Sun 01:00
- **Vell:** Wed 01:00, Sun 18:00
- **Isabella:** Mon-Sun 09:00 & 15:15
- **Mammore:** 04:15, 15:00, 18:00, 21:15, 22:00

**Loot Bundles:**
- **Standard:** 20k Caphras/BS, 10k Crons, Valks (+350), 200k Pearl Box.
- **Nightmare:** 40k Caphras/BS, 20k Crons, 2x Valks (+350).

**Custom Boss Loot:**
- **Isabella:** 30k Caphras, Halloweenie Box (40%), Valks (+500), Pet Box.
- **Mammore:** 50k Caphras, 1k Seal of Undying, Bear Meat, Valks (+500), Taxidermied Bears.

title: 13. Primordial Gear Recipes
description:
**Primordial Weapons (Manufacture):**
- PEN Blackstar Weapon + 30k Caphras + Flame of Primordial (Heat 100 Embers).
- **Sub-Weapon:** PEN Blackstar + 20k Caphras + Flame.
- **Sol:** PEN Artina + 100k Caphras + Flame.

**Primordial Armor (Manufacture):**
- Obliterating Fallen God Piece + Daemon Flame (Heat 100 Embers) + 20k Caphras.

**Primordial Tome:**
- Drop: Shultz. Stats: 2 Crystal Slots, 1000% EXP. PEN: AP+25, Acc+50.

**Primordial Cups:**
- Alastor (Neck), Aethon (Ear), Nyctaeus (Belt), Orphnaeus (Ring).
- **Recipe:** 1x Primordial Dusk + 2000x Specific Shard (Heart of Arid Forest, Shard of Drained/Furious/Tearful Night).

title: 14. Exalted Gear & Weapon Reform
description:
**Exalted Armor Recipe:**
- PEN Primordial Piece + Primordial Dawnstone (Heat 5 Twilight) + Exalted Flame + 500k Caphras.

**PVE Weapon Reform (100x Stone + 200x Despair):**
- **Predation (Main):** Monster AP +60, Crit +25% (Lux Stone).
- **Descended (Awk):** Monster AP +60, Crit +25% (Blizzard Stone).
- **Hunter (Sub):** Monster AP +100, Species +20 (50 Lux + 50 Fire).

**PVP Weapon Reform:**
- **Blighted (Main):** Human Dmg +50 (Water Stone).
- **Gravity (Awk):** Ignore Resist 60% (Celestial Stone).
- **Sniper (Sub):** Acc +125, Crit +30% (Lux + Celestial).

**Enhancement:** PRI(700), DUO(900), TRI(1200), TET(1500), PEN(2000) Exalted Stones.

title: 15. Exalted Stone Locations
description:
**Fire:** Sulfur Mines (Solo) | **Water:** Protty Cave (Solo)
**Aura:** Blood Wolves (Solo) | **Lux:** Waragons (Party 3)
**Fear:** Pila Ku (Solo) | **Shadow:** Star's End (Party 2)
**Blizzard:** Tunkuta (Party 2) | **Earth:** Ronaros/Oluns
**Celestial:** Crypt (Party 2) | **Death:** Ash Forest (Party 2)

**Exchange:** 1x Exalted Stone -> 1x Mass of Pure Magic Bundle.

title: 16. Accessories & Crystals
description:
**Primordial Accs (Base):** Ring (15 AP), Earring (21 AP), Belt (24 AP), Necklace (40 AP).
**Exalted Accs:** Ring (21 AP/52 Acc), Earring (21 AP/62 Acc), Belt (24 AP/60 Acc), Necklace (35 AP/88 Acc).

**Custom Crystals:**
- **Eternia (Awk):** AP +12, Acc +12 (Ibedor).
- **Medusa (Sub):** Crit/Back Dmg +10% (Nagas).
- **Athena (Helm):** Monster DR 12% (Thornwood).
- **Artemis (Chest):** PvE Resist 100% (Fadus).
- **Aphrodite (Gloves):** Acc +20, Monster AP +50 (Kratuga).
- **Persephone (Shoes):** DR +25, HP +250 (Monastery).
- **Eye of the Golem:** 350 HP, 35 Eva, 5 AP.
- **Medusa's Sea Crystal:** Boat Stats +20%, Weight +12k.

title: 17. Alchemy Stones (Vell/Khan)
description:
**Primordial Vell's:** Vell's Heart + Exalted Soul + 500k Caphras + Garmoth Heart + 200 Latent Aura.
**Exalted Vell's:** Vell's Heart + Exalted Soul + 500k Caphras + Garmoth Heart + 1x Savage Heart.
**Gaia's Khan Heart:** Khan's Magic + Exalted Soul + 500k Caphras + Garmoth Heart + Protection Stone.

*Exalted Soul Fragment:* 500 Despair + 50k Magical Shards + 50k Alch Shards.

title: 18. Life Skills (Gaia Gear & Tools)
description:
**Max Mastery:** 6000 (+500% Drop Rate/Quantity).

**Gaia Recipes (Manufacture):**
- **Clothes:** PEN Manos + 50k Caphras + 10k Conc. Black Gems (1200 Mastery).
- **Tools:** PEN Manos + 20k Caphras + 5k Conc. Black Gems (1s Gather Time).
- **Tome:** 50k Caphras + 1000 Gaia Gems + 10k Ruby/Sapphire (1000 Mastery).
- **Ultimate Clothes:** All 4 Gaia Clothes + 1M Caphras.

**Tools:**
- **Gaia Fishing Rod:** +10% Big Fish, -20% Time.
- **Gaia Matchlock:** 12k Dmg, +10% Crit/Reload.

**Exalted Horse Gear:** +10 Krogdalo + 50k Caphras + 10k Conc. Gems.

title: 19. Imperial Training & T10
description:
**Imperial Feathers Exchange:**
- T1 (1), T2 (2), T3 (3), T4 (4), T5 (5), T6 (10), T7 (15), T8 (20).

**Custom T10 Arduanatt (White) Recipe:**
- 3,000 Gaia's Imperial Feathers
- 1,000,000 Orichalcum Ingots
- 1,000,000 Adamantite Ingots
- 5,000,000 Caphras Stones

**Webshop Skins:** Flame/Hell Knight (Doom), Terra/Tidal Knight (Dine), Sky/Frost Knight (Arduanatt).

title: 20. Custom Recipes (Cooking/Alchemy)
description:
**Cooking (5000x mats + 100x Spice + 50k Meals):**
- **Spaghetti (AP/HP):** Coconut Pasta + Knight Rations + Red Sauce.
- **Pancakes (DP/Eva):** Calpheon Meal + Milk Tea + Honeycomb Cookies.
- **Ramen (Monster AP):** Mushroom Salad + Stir-Fried Bracken + Seafood Pasta.
- **Sushi (Life EXP):** Margoria Meal + Smoked Fish + Couscous.

**Alchemy:**
- **Glorious Perfume:** 6x Corrupt Oil + Perfume + Forest Tread.
- **Perfume of Insight:** Essence of Insight, Trace of Nature, Monk's Branch, Purified Water, Powder of Crevice.
- **Bulk:** 100x/1000x Recipes for Caphras and Black Gems via Simple Alchemy.

title: 21. NPC Exchanges & Boxes
description:
**Igor Bartali:** Snowflakes -> Manos/Censer/Potions. Margoria Tokens -> Carrack Mats.
**GM Ork:** Snowflakes -> Black Stones/Caphras. Night Fangs -> Ibedor.
**Bahar:** Medusa Tokens -> Outfits (150)/Garmoth Heart (100)/Workers (30).
**Exodus Tokens:** Weapon Coupons (20), Merchant Ring (5000).
**Shakatu Seals:** T8 Horse (50), EXP Coupon (1000).
**Undying Seals:** Valks+500 (1000), Dream Box (200), Titles (500).
**Remnants of Destiny:** Valks+500 (500), Dice Boxes (100).
**Cherry Blossoms:** Dream/Gacha Box (20), Caphras Box (10).

**Loot Boxes:**
- **Gacha/Dream:** Valks+300, Primordial Accs, 9k Caphras/Crons, Exalted Stones.
- **Halloweenie:** Valks+5000, Terraria Buffs.
- **Dice Boxes:** Caphras (1-2k), Crons (1-4k), Valks (+400).

title: 22. Siege & Buffs
description:
**Siege Rewards:** 10 Trillion Silver, 1M Caphras, 500 Medals, Harmony Draughts.
**Node War Box:** 200 Medals, 20k Crons, 5 Trillion Silver.
**Siege Titles (Weekly):** Stormtrooper (4k), Special Force (8k), Ultimate Weapon (18k).

**Rare Buffs (5h):** Life Crystal (DR+100), Vital Crystal (HP+800), Aegis Fruit (Monster Dmg+150), Arcane Crystal (Acc+80).
**Stat Boosters (1h):** Mana/Life/Damage Boosters, Galaxy Pearl (Drop Rate +100%).
**Fish Prices:** Manta Ray (150B), Pink Dolphin (100B), Blue Lobster (50B).
